lead_paragraph: Gerrit Cole pitched six impressive innings for his first win this season and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat the San Diego Padres 11-1 on Thursday night to avoid a three-game sweep.

headline.print_headline: Cole Pitches Well, Pirates Rout Padres 11-1 to Avoid Sweep
headline.main: Cole Pitches Well, Pirates Rout Padres 11-1 to Avoid Sweep

snippet: Gerrit Cole pitched six impressive innings for his first win this season and the Pittsburgh Pirates beat the San Diego Padres 11-1 on Thursday night to avoid a three-game sweep....
